      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action Behaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      A factory for creating actions.
      Action Farmer.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Return an action get from the behaviour in behaviours array to perform on the current turn if the action is not null, else return a DoNothingAction.
      Action Human.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Return an action get from the behaviour in behaviours array to perform on the current turn if the action is not null, else return a DoNothingAction.
      Action Player.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn according to the displayed description of Action on the menu.
      Action Zombie.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      If a Zombie can attack, it will.

    • Uses of Action in game.actions

      Subclasses of Action in game.actions 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AttackAction
      Special Action for attacking other Actors.
      class  CraftingAction
      Special Action that allows actor to craft a weapon
      class  EatAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to eat and recover health points.
      class  FertilizeAction
      Special Action for fertilizing an unripe Crop to decrease the time left to ripe.
      class  HarvestAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to harvest a ripe crop for food.
      class  SowAction
      Special Action for sowing a Crop.
      class  ZombieAttackAction
      Special Action that allows only Zombie to attack

    • Uses of Action in game.behaviours

      Methods in game.behaviours that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action AttackBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a ZombieAttackAction if the actor is a Zombie that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
      Action EatBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an EatAction that allows an damaged Actor who is standing on a Food to eat.
      Action FertilizeBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a FertilizeAction that allows an Actor who is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
      Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      Action HarvestBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a HarvestAction that allows an Actor who is standing on or next to a ripe Crop to harvest it.
      Action HuntBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
      Action PickUpWeaponBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a PickUpItemAction if there is an WeaponItem on the location it's standing
      Action SowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a SowAction that allows an Actor whose adjacent Ground is a Dirt to have 33% probability of sowing a crop on it.
      Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
